english.segment1: I wanna sing hallelujah. All my praises for you. I wanna go where angel's prostrate fall. I wanna be right here when you call
english.segment2: I will sing. To my king. The one who reigns on high. I will sing. To my king. The one who reigns on high. I will sing
english.segment4: Jesus washed. Jesus washed all my stains
